definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: In the electronic products used as demoulding agent of electronic components.
sentences.chinese: 在电子产品中可作电子元件的脱模剂。

sentences.english: Also be used as the binder and the outer wall decoration material.
sentences.chinese: 同时，也可作粘结剂及外墙装饰材料。

sentences.english: The pipe of the blower stretches into the pot for heating of cooling purpose. The thermal capacity can be ajusted.
sentences.chinese: 出风管伸入锅内可作加热或吹冷，热量也可以调节。

sentences.english: The police have only one fingerprint to hang on to.
sentences.chinese: 警察唯有一个指纹印可作线索。

sentences.english: I do set my bow in the cloud， and it shall be for a token of a covenant between me and the earth.
sentences.chinese: 我把虹放在云彩中，这就可作我与地立约的记号了。

sentences.english: Not only can the switch be used as a timing switch, but also be used as an ordinary switch.
sentences.chinese: 功能多，既可作定时开关，也可当普通开关使用。

sentences.english: This pesticide product should only be used for purposes as specified on the label.
sentences.chinese: 此除害剂只可作标签上特定之用途。

sentences.english: Oxalic acid can be used for antimony mordant, ferric ammonium oxalate are printed on blueprint Pharmacy.
sentences.chinese: 草酸锑可作媒染剂，草酸铁铵是印制蓝图的药剂。

sentences.english: Litharge itself has been used as a stabilizer.
sentences.chinese: 一氧化铅本身就可作稳定剂使用。

sentences.english: These coveralls are intended to be sold for non-clinical use.
sentences.chinese: 这批拍卖的防护衣只可作非医护用途。

sentences.english: The marines could shoot from a distance and also do close hand-to-hand combat.
sentences.chinese: 舰队可远距离射击也可作短距离的战斗。

sentences.english: I have set my rainbow in the clouds, and it will be the sign of the covenant between me and the earth.
sentences.chinese: 我把虹放在云彩中，这就可作我与地立约的记号了。

sentences.english: Import valve seat can shave the disheartened board, close freely even un fall gray cases.
sentences.chinese: 进口阀座可作刮灰板，即使在落灰情况下也关闭自如。

sentences.english: The tense system is based on two basic principles.
sentences.chinese: 二是递归性，即时态在系统内可作重复选择。

sentences.english: As pure metal, it is used to coat other metals (see plating) and as a catalyst.
sentences.chinese: 作为纯金属时可镀于其它金属表面，也可作催化剂。

sentences.english: The reproduced items can only be used for the purpose as stated in the Declaration.
sentences.chinese: 该等复制项目只可作声明中列举之用途。

definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
